workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4378904922585388 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.1987759290607662 --weight-decay 0.0003121028608281936 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0003691364731912802 --lr-period-updates 148342.33040749608 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.10411044490666568 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
